actionConfiguration.body:
select 
d::date as date, 
to_char(sum(to_timestamp(end_time, 'HH24:MI') - to_timestamp(start_time, 'HH24:MI')),'HH:MI') as Daily_time
from 
generate_series
(
	timestamp '{{Select_Year.selectedOptionValue}}-{{Select_Month.selectedOptionValue}}-{{moment().startOf('month').format('DD')}}'
	, timestamp '{{Select_Year.selectedOptionValue}}-{{Select_Month.selectedOptionValue}}-{{moment(Select_Month.selectedOptionValue,'MM').daysInMonth()}}'
	, '1 day'::interval) d
left join vrgr_vargar.register r on d::date = to_date(r.date, 'DD-MM-YYYY')
where extract(dow from d::date) between 1 and 5
group by d::date
order by date
